original: duḥkhatrayābhighātāj jijñāsā tadabhighātake hetau /
analyzed: duḥkha traya abhighātāt jijñāsā tad abhighātake hetau

original: dṛṣṭe sāpārthā cen naikāntātyantato 'bhāvāt // ISk_1 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭe sā apārthā ced na ekānta atyantataḥ bhāvāt

original: dṛṣṭavad ānuśravikaḥ sa hy aviśuddhaḥ kṣayātiśayayuktaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa vat ānuśravikaḥ sa hi aviśuddhaḥ kṣaya atiśaya yuktaḥ

original: tadviparītaḥ śreyān vyaktāvyaktajñavijñānāt // ISk_2 //
analyzed: tad viparītaḥ śreyān vyakta avyakta jña vijñānāt

original: mūlaprakṛtir avikṛtir mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapta /
analyzed: mūlaprakṛtiḥ avikṛtiḥ mahat ādyāḥ prakṛti vikṛtayaḥ sapta

original: ṣoḍaśakas tu vikāro na prakṛtir na vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ // ISk_3 //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśakaḥ tu vikāraḥ na prakṛtiḥ na vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ

original: dṛṣṭam anumānam āptavacanaṃ ca sarvapramāṇasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam anumānam āpta vacanam ca sarva pramāṇa siddha tvāt

original: trividhaṃ pramāṇam iṣṭaṃ prameyasiddhiḥ pramāṇād dhi // ISk_4 //
analyzed: trividham pramāṇam iṣṭam prameya siddhiḥ pramāṇāt hi

original: prativiṣayādhyavasāyo dṛṣṭaṃ trividham anumānam ākhyātam /
analyzed: prati viṣaya adhyavasāyaḥ dṛṣṭam trividham anumānam ākhyātam

original: tal liṅgaliṅgipūrvakam āptaśrutir āptavacanaṃ tu // ISk_5 //
analyzed: tat liṅga liṅgi pūrvakam āpta śrutiḥ āpta vacanam tu

original: sāmānyatas tu dṛṣṭād atīndriyāṇāṃ pratītir anumānāt /
analyzed: sāmānyatas tu dṛṣṭāt atīndriyāṇām pratītiḥ anumānāt

original: tasmād api cāsiddhaṃ parokṣam āptāgamāt sādhyam // ISk_6 //
analyzed: tasmāt api ca asiddham parokṣam āpta āgamāt sādhyam

original: atidūrāt sāmīpyād indriyaghātān mano'navasthānāt /
analyzed: ati dūrāt sāmīpyāt indriya ghātāt manaḥ navasthānāt

original: saukṣmyād vyavadhānād abhibhavāt samānābhihārāc ca // ISk_7 //
analyzed: saukṣmyāt vyavadhānāt abhibhavāt samāna abhihārāt ca

original: saukṣmyāt tadanupalabdhir nābhāvāt kāryatas tadupalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: saukṣmyāt tad anupalabdhiḥ na abhāvāt kāryataḥ tad upalabdhiḥ

original: mahadādi tac ca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca // ISk_8 //
analyzed: mahat ādi tat ca kāryam prakṛti virūpam sarūpam ca

original: asadakaraṇād upādānagrahaṇāt sarvasambhavābhāvāt /
analyzed: asat akaraṇāt upādāna grahaṇāt sarva sambhava abhāvāt

original: śaktasya śakyakaraṇāt kāraṇabhāvāc ca sat kāryam // ISk_9 //
analyzed: śaktasya śakya karaṇāt kāraṇa bhāvāt ca sat kāryam

original: hetumad anityam avyāpi sakriyam anekam āśritaṃ liṅgam /
analyzed: hetumat anityam avyāpi sa kriyam anekam āśritam liṅgam

original: sāvayavaṃ paratantraṃ vyaktaṃ viparītam avyaktam // ISk_10 //
analyzed: sa avayavam paratantram vyaktam viparītam avyaktam

original: triguṇam aviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyam acetana prasavadharmi /
analyzed: triguṇam aviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyam acetana prasava dharmi

original: vyaktaṃ tathā pradhānaṃ tadviparītas tathā ca pumān // ISk_11 //
analyzed: vyaktam tathā pradhānam tad viparītaḥ tathā ca pumān

original: prītyaprītiviṣādātmakāḥ prakāśapravṛttiniyamārthāḥ /
analyzed: prīti aprīti viṣāda ātmakāḥ prakāśa pravṛtti niyama arthāḥ

original: anyo 'nyābhibhavāśrayajananamithunavṛttayaś ca guṇāḥ // ISk_12 //
analyzed: anyaḥ nya abhibhava āśraya janana mithuna vṛttayaḥ ca guṇāḥ

original: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakam iṣṭam upaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ /
analyzed: sattvam laghu prakāśakam iṣṭam upaṣṭambhakam calam ca rajaḥ

original: guru varaṇakam eva tamaḥ pradīpavac cārthato vṛttiḥ // ISk_13 //
analyzed: guru varaṇakam eva tamaḥ pradīpavat ca arthataḥ vṛttiḥ

original: avivekyādiḥ siddhas traiguṇyāt tadviparyayābhāvāt /
analyzed: aviveki ādiḥ siddhaḥ traiguṇyāt tad viparyaya abhāvāt

original: kāraṇaguṇātmakatvāt kāryasyāvyaktam api siddham // ISk_14 //
analyzed: kāraṇa guṇa ātmaka tvāt kāryasya avyaktam api siddham

original: bhedānāṃ parimāṇāt samanvayāc chaktitaḥ pravṛtteś ca /
analyzed: bhedānām parimāṇāt samanvayāt śaktitaḥ pravṛtteḥ ca

original: kāraṇakāryavibhāgād avibhāgād vaiśvarūpyasya // ISk_15 //
analyzed: kāraṇa kārya vibhāgāt avibhāgāt vaiśvarūpyasya

original: kāraṇam asty avyaktaṃ pravartate triguṇataḥ samudayāc ca /
analyzed: kāraṇam asti avyaktam pravartate triguṇataḥ samudayāt ca

original: pariṇāmataḥ salilavat pratipratiguṇāśrayaviśeṣāt // ISk_16 //
analyzed: pariṇāmataḥ salila vat prati prati guṇa āśraya viśeṣāt

original: saṅghātaparārthatvāt triguṇādiviparyayād adhiṣṭhānāt /
analyzed: saṅghāta para artha tvāt triguṇa ādi viparyayāt adhiṣṭhānāt

original: puruṣo 'sti bhoktṛbhāvāt kaivalyārthapravṛtteś ca // ISk_17 //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ sti bhoktṛ bhāvāt kaivalya artha pravṛtteḥ ca

original: janmamaraṇakaraṇānāṃ pratiniyamād ayugapatpravṛtteś ca /
analyzed: janma maraṇa karaṇānām pratiniyamāt ayugapad pravṛtteḥ ca

original: puruṣabahutvaṃ siddhaṃ traiguṇyaviparyayāc caiva // ISk_18 //
analyzed: puruṣa bahu tvam siddham traiguṇya viparyayāt ca eva

original: tasmāc ca viparyāsāt siddhaṃ sākṣitvam asya puruṣasya /
analyzed: tasmāt ca viparyāsāt siddham sākṣi tvam asya puruṣasya

original: kaivalyaṃ mādhyasthyaṃ draṣṭṛtvam akartṛbhāvaś ca // ISk_19 //
analyzed: kaivalyam mādhyasthyam draṣṭṛ tvam akartṛ bhāvaḥ ca

original: tasmāt tatsaṃyogād acetanaṃ cetanāvad iva liṅgam /
analyzed: tasmāt tad saṃyogāt acetanam cetanāvat iva liṅgam

original: guṇakartṛtve 'pi tathā karteva bhavaty udāsīnaḥ // ISk_20 //
analyzed: guṇa kartṛ tve pi tathā kartā iva bhavati udāsīnaḥ

original: puruṣasya darśanārthaṃ kaivalyārthaṃ tathā pradhānasya /
analyzed: puruṣasya darśana artham kaivalya artham tathā pradhānasya

original: paṅgvandhavad ubhayor api saṃyogas tatkṛtaḥ sargaḥ // ISk_21 //
analyzed: paṅgu andha vat ubhayoḥ api saṃyogaḥ tad kṛtaḥ sargaḥ

original: prakṛter mahāṃs tato 'haṅkāras tasmād gaṇaś ca ṣoḍaśakaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛteḥ mahān tatas haṅkāraḥ tasmāt gaṇaḥ ca ṣoḍaśakaḥ

original: tasmād api ṣoḍaśakāt pañcabhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni // ISk_22 //
analyzed: tasmāt api ṣoḍaśakāt pañcabhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni

original: adhyavasāyo buddhir dharmo jñānaṃ virāga aiśvaryam /
analyzed: adhyavasāyaḥ buddhiḥ dharmaḥ jñānam virāgaḥ aiśvaryam

original: sāttvikam etad rūpaṃ tāmasam asmād viparyastam // ISk_23 //
analyzed: sāttvikam etat rūpam tāmasam asmāt viparyastam

original: abhimāno 'haṅkāras tasmād dvividhaḥ pravartate sargaḥ /
analyzed: abhimānaḥ haṅkāraḥ tasmāt dvividhaḥ pravartate sargaḥ

original: aindriya ekādaśakas tanmātrapañcakaś caiva // ISk_24 //
analyzed: aindriyaḥ ekādaśakaḥ tanmātra pañcakaḥ ca eva

original: sāttvika ekādaśakaḥ pravartate vaikṛtād ahaṅkārāt /
analyzed: sāttvikaḥ ekādaśakaḥ pravartate vaikṛtāt ahaṅkārāt

original: bhūtādes tanmātraḥ sa tāmasas taijasād ubhayam // ISk_25 //
analyzed: bhūtādeḥ tanmātraḥ sa tāmasaḥ taijasāt ubhayam

original: buddhīndriyāṇi śrotratvakcakṣūrasananāsikākhyāni /
analyzed: buddhīndriyāṇi śrotra tvac cakṣuḥ rasana nāsikā ākhyāni

original: vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthān karmendriyāṇy āhuḥ // ISk_26 //
analyzed: vāc pāṇi pāda pāyu upasthān karmendriyāṇi āhuḥ

original: ubhayātmakam atra manaḥ saṅkalpakam indriyaṃ ca sādharmyāt /
analyzed: ubhaya ātmakam atra manaḥ saṅkalpakam indriyam ca sādharmyāt

original: guṇapariṇāmaviśeṣān nānātvaṃ grāhyabhedāc ca // ISk_27 //
analyzed: guṇa pariṇāma viśeṣāt nānā tvam grāhya bhedāt ca

original: rūpādiṣu pañcānām ālocanamatram iṣyate vṛttiḥ /
analyzed: rūpa ādiṣu pañcānām ālocana matram iṣyate vṛttiḥ

original: vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandās tu pañcānām // ISk_28 //
analyzed: vacana ādāna viharaṇa utsarga ānandāḥ tu pañcānām

original: svālakṣaṇyā vṛttis trayasya saiṣā bhavaty asāmānyā /
analyzed: svālakṣaṇyā vṛttiḥ trayasya sā eṣā bhavati asāmānyā

original: sāmānyakaraṇavṛttiḥ prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañca // ISk_29 //
analyzed: sāmānya karaṇa vṛttiḥ prāṇa ādyāḥ vāyavaḥ pañca

original: yugapac catuṣṭayasya hi vṛttiḥ kramaśaś ca tasya nirdiṣṭā /
analyzed: yugapad catuṣṭayasya hi vṛttiḥ kramaśas ca tasya nirdiṣṭā

original: dṛṣṭe tathāpy adṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiḥ // ISk_30 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭe tathā api adṛṣṭe trayasya tad pūrvikā vṛttiḥ

original: svāṃ svāṃ pratipadyante parasparākūtahetukāṃ vṛttim /
analyzed: svām svām pratipadyante paraspara ākūta hetukām vṛttim

original: puruṣārtha eva hetur na kenacit kāryate karaṇam // ISk_31 //
analyzed: puruṣa arthaḥ eva hetuḥ na kenacid kāryate karaṇam

original: karaṇaṃ trayodaśavidhaṃ tadāharaṇadhāraṇaprakāśakaram /
analyzed: karaṇam trayodaśavidham tad āharaṇa dhāraṇa prakāśa karam

original: kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhāhāryaṃ dhāryaṃ prakāśyaṃ ca // ISk_32 //
analyzed: kāryam ca tasya daśadhā āhāryam dhāryam prakāśyam ca

original: antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhaṃ daśadhā bāhyaṃ trayasya viṣayākhyam /
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇam trividham daśadhā bāhyam trayasya viṣaya ākhyam

original: sāmpratakālaṃ bāhyaṃ trikālam ābhyantaraṃ karaṇam // ISk_33 //
analyzed: sāmprata kālam bāhyam tri kālam ābhyantaram karaṇam

original: buddhīndriyāṇi teṣāṃ pañca viśeṣāviśeṣaviṣayāṇi /
analyzed: buddhīndriyāṇi teṣām pañca viśeṣa aviśeṣa viṣayāṇi

original: vāg bhavati śabdaviṣayā śeṣāny api pañcaviṣayāṇi // ISk_34 //
analyzed: vāc bhavati śabda viṣayā śeṣāni api pañca viṣayāṇi

original: sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhiḥ sarvaṃ viṣayam avagāhate yasmāt /
analyzed: sa antaḥkaraṇā buddhiḥ sarvam viṣayam avagāhate yasmāt

original: tasmāt trividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi // ISk_35 //
analyzed: tasmāt trividham karaṇam dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi

original: ete pradīpakalpāḥ parasparavilakṣaṇā guṇaviśeṣāḥ /
analyzed: ete pradīpa kalpāḥ paraspara vilakṣaṇāḥ guṇa viśeṣāḥ

original: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti // ISk_36 //
analyzed: kṛtsnam puruṣasya artham prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti

original: sarvaṃ pratyupabhogaṃ yasmāt puruṣasya sādhayati buddhiḥ /
analyzed: sarvam pratyupabhogam yasmāt puruṣasya sādhayati buddhiḥ

original: saiva ca viśinaṣṭi tataḥ pradhānapuruṣāntaraṃ sūkṣmam // ISk_37 //
analyzed: sā eva ca viśinaṣṭi tatas pradhāna puruṣa antaram sūkṣmam

original: tanmātrāṇy aviśeṣās tebhyo bhūtāni pañca pañcabhyaḥ /
analyzed: tanmātrāṇi aviśeṣāḥ tebhyaḥ bhūtāni pañca pañcabhyaḥ

original: ete smṛtā viśeṣāḥ śāntā ghorāś ca mūḍhāś ca // ISk_38 //
analyzed: ete smṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ śāntāḥ ghorāḥ ca mūḍhāḥ ca

original: sūkṣmā mātāpitṛjāḥ saha prabhūtais tridhā viśeṣāḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: sūkṣmāḥ mātā pitṛ jāḥ saha prabhūtaiḥ tridhā viśeṣāḥ syuḥ

original: sūkṣmās teṣāṃ niyatā mātāpitṛjā nivartante // ISk_39 //
analyzed: sūkṣmāḥ teṣām niyatāḥ mātā pitṛ jāḥ nivartante

original: pūrvotpannam asaktaṃ niyataṃ mahadādisūkṣmaparyantam /
analyzed: pūrva utpannam asaktam niyatam mahat ādi sūkṣma paryantam

original: saṃsarati nirupabhogaṃ bhāvair adhivāsitaṃ liṅgam // ISk_40 //
analyzed: saṃsarati nirupabhogam bhāvaiḥ adhivāsitam liṅgam

original: citraṃ yathāśrayamṛte sthāṇvādibhyo vinā yathā chāyā /
analyzed: citram yathā āśrayam ṛte sthāṇu ādibhyaḥ vinā yathā chāyā

original: tadvad vināviśeṣais tiṣṭhati na nirāśrayaṃ liṅgam // ISk_41 //
analyzed: tadvat vinā aviśeṣaiḥ tiṣṭhati na nirāśrayam liṅgam

original: puruṣārthahetukam idaṃ nimittanaimittikaprasaṅgena /
analyzed: puruṣa artha hetukam idam nimitta naimittika prasaṅgena

original: prakṛter vibhutvayogān naṭavad vyavatiṣṭhate liṅgam // ISk_42 //
analyzed: prakṛteḥ vibhu tva yogāt naṭa vat vyavatiṣṭhate liṅgam

original: sāṃsiddhikāś ca bhāvāḥ prākṛtikā vaikṛtāś ca dharmādyāḥ /
analyzed: sāṃsiddhikāḥ ca bhāvāḥ prākṛtikāḥ vaikṛtāḥ ca dharma ādyāḥ

original: dṛṣṭāḥ karaṇāśrayiṇaḥ kāryāśrayiṇaś ca kalalādyāḥ // ISk_43 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ karaṇa āśrayiṇaḥ kārya āśrayiṇaḥ ca kalala ādyāḥ

original: dharmeṇa gamanam ūrdhvaṃ gamanam adhastād bhavaty adharmeṇa /
analyzed: dharmeṇa gamanam ūrdhvam gamanam adhastāt bhavati adharmeṇa

original: jñānena cāpavargo viparyayād iṣyate bandhaḥ // ISk_44 //
analyzed: jñānena ca apavargaḥ viparyayāt iṣyate bandhaḥ

original: vairāgyāt prakṛtilayaḥ saṃsāro rājasād bhavati rāgāt /
analyzed: vairāgyāt prakṛti layaḥ saṃsāraḥ rājasāt bhavati rāgāt

original: aiśvaryād avighāto viparyayāt tadviparyāsaḥ // ISk_45 //
analyzed: aiśvaryāt avighātaḥ viparyayāt tad viparyāsaḥ

original: eṣa pratyayasargo viparyayāśaktituṣṭisiddhyākhyaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa pratyaya sargaḥ viparyaya aśakti tuṣṭi siddhi ākhyaḥ

original: guṇavaiṣamyavimardena tasya bhedās tu pañcāśat // ISk_46 //
analyzed: guṇa vaiṣamya vimardena tasya bhedāḥ tu pañcāśat

original: pañca viparyayabhedā bhavanty aśakteś ca karaṇavaikalyāt /
analyzed: pañca viparyaya bhedāḥ bhavanti aśakteḥ ca karaṇa vaikalyāt

original: aṣṭāviṃśatibhedā tuṣṭir navadhāṣṭadhā siddhiḥ // ISk_47 //
analyzed: aṣṭāviṃśati bhedā tuṣṭiḥ navadhā aṣṭadhā siddhiḥ

original: bhedas tamaso 'ṣṭavidho mohasya ca daśavidho mahāmohaḥ /
analyzed: bhedaḥ tamasaḥ ṣṭavidhaḥ mohasya ca daśavidhaḥ mahāmohaḥ

original: tāmisro 'ṣṭādaśadhā tathā bhavaty andhatāmisraḥ // ISk_48 //
analyzed: tāmisraḥ ṣṭādaśadhā tathā bhavati andhatāmisraḥ

original: ekādaśendriyavadhāḥ saha buddhivadhair aśaktir uddiṣṭā /
analyzed: ekādaśa indriya vadhāḥ saha buddhi vadhaiḥ aśaktiḥ uddiṣṭā

original: saptadaśa vadhā buddher viparyayāt tuṣṭisiddhīnām // ISk_49 //
analyzed: saptadaśa vadhāḥ buddheḥ viparyayāt tuṣṭi siddhīnām

original: ādhyātmikyaś catasraḥ prakṛtyupādānakālabhāgyākhyāḥ /
analyzed: ādhyātmikyaḥ catasraḥ prakṛti upādāna kāla bhāgya ākhyāḥ

original: bāhyā viṣayoparamāt pañca nava ca tuṣṭayo 'bhihitāḥ // ISk_50 //
analyzed: bāhyāḥ viṣaya uparamāt pañca nava ca tuṣṭayaḥ bhihitāḥ

original: ūhaḥ śabdo 'dhyayanaṃ duḥkhavighātatrayaṃ suhṛtprāptiḥ /
analyzed: ūhaḥ śabdaḥ dhyayanam duḥkha vighāta trayam suhṛd prāptiḥ

original: dānaṃ ca siddhayo 'ṣṭau siddheḥ pūrvo 'ṅkuśas trividhaḥ // ISk_51 //
analyzed: dānam ca siddhayaḥ ṣṭau siddheḥ pūrvaḥ ṅkuśaḥ trividhaḥ

original: na vinā bhāvair liṅgaṃ na vinā liṅgena bhāvanirvṛttiḥ /
analyzed: na vinā bhāvaiḥ liṅgam na vinā liṅgena bhāva nirvṛttiḥ

original: liṅgākhyo bhāvākhyas tasmād bhavati dvidhā sargaḥ // ISk_52 //
analyzed: liṅga ākhyaḥ bhāva ākhyaḥ tasmāt bhavati dvidhā sargaḥ

original: aṣṭavikalpo daivas tairyagyonaś ca pañcadhā bhavati /
analyzed: aṣṭa vikalpaḥ daivaḥ tairyagyonaḥ ca pañcadhā bhavati

original: mānuṣyaś caikavidhaḥ samāsato bhautikaḥ sargaḥ // ISk_53 //
analyzed: mānuṣyaḥ ca ekavidhaḥ samāsatas bhautikaḥ sargaḥ

original: ūrdhvaṃ sattvaviśālas tamoviśālaś ca mūlataḥ sargaḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhvam sattva viśālaḥ tamaḥ viśālaḥ ca mūlataḥ sargaḥ

original: madhye rajoviśālo brahmādistambaparyantaḥ // ISk_54 //
analyzed: madhye rajaḥ viśālaḥ brahma ādi stamba paryantaḥ

original: atra jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: atra jarā maraṇa kṛtam duḥkham prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ

original: liṅgasyāvinivṛttes tasmād duḥkhaṃ samāsena // ISk_55 //
analyzed: liṅgasya avinivṛtteḥ tasmāt duḥkham samāsena

original: ity eṣa prakṛtikṛto mahadādiviṣayabhūtaparyantaḥ /
analyzed: iti eṣa prakṛti kṛtaḥ mahat ādi viṣaya bhūta paryantaḥ

original: pratipuruṣavimokṣārthaṃ svārtha iva parārtha ārambhaḥ // ISk_56 //
analyzed: prati puruṣa vimokṣa artham sva arthe iva para arthe ārambhaḥ

original: vatsavivṛddhinimittaṃ kṣīrasya yathā pravṛttir ajñasya /
analyzed: vatsa vivṛddhi nimittam kṣīrasya yathā pravṛttiḥ ajñasya

original: puruṣavimokṣanimittaṃ tathā pravṛttiḥ pradhānasya // ISk_57 //
analyzed: puruṣa vimokṣa nimittam tathā pravṛttiḥ pradhānasya

original: autsukyanivṛttyarthaṃ yathā kriyāsu pravartate lokaḥ /
analyzed: autsukya nivṛtti artham yathā kriyāsu pravartate lokaḥ

original: puruṣasya vimokṣārthaṃ pravartate tadvad avyaktam // ISk_58 //
analyzed: puruṣasya vimokṣa artham pravartate tadvat avyaktam

original: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛtyāt /
analyzed: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛtyāt

original: puruṣasya tathātmānaṃ prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ // ISk_59 //
analyzed: puruṣasya tathā ātmānam prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ

original: nānāvidhair upāyair upakāriṇy anupakāriṇaḥ puṃsaḥ /
analyzed: nānāvidhaiḥ upāyaiḥ upakāriṇī anupakāriṇaḥ puṃsaḥ

original: guṇavaty aguṇasya satas tasyārtham apārthakaṃ carati // ISk_60 //
analyzed: guṇavati aguṇasya sataḥ tasya artham apārthakam carati

original: prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ na kiñcid astīti me matir bhavati /
analyzed: prakṛteḥ sukumārataram na kiñcid asti iti me matiḥ bhavati

original: yā dṛṣṭāsmīti punar na darśanam upaiti puruṣasya // ISk_61 //
analyzed: yā dṛṣṭā asmi iti punar na darśanam upaiti puruṣasya

original: tasmān na badhyate nāpi mucyate nāpi saṃsarati kaścit /
analyzed: tasmāt na badhyate na api mucyate na api saṃsarati kaścid

original: saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ // ISk_62 //
analyzed: saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānā āśrayā prakṛtiḥ

original: rūpaiḥ saptabhir evaṃ badhnāty ātmānam ātmanā prakṛtiḥ /
analyzed: rūpaiḥ saptabhiḥ evam badhnāti ātmānam ātmanā prakṛtiḥ

original: saiva ca puruṣasyārthaṃ prati vimocayaty ekarūpeṇa // ISk_63 //
analyzed: sā eva ca puruṣasya artham prati vimocayati eka rūpeṇa

original: evaṃ tattvābhyāsān nāsmi na me nāham ity apariśeṣam /
analyzed: evam tattva abhyāsāt na asmi na me na aham iti apariśeṣam

original: aviparyayād viśuddhaṃ kevalam utpadyate jñānam // ISk_64 //
analyzed: aviparyayāt viśuddham kevalam utpadyate jñānam

original: tena nivṛttaprasavām arthavaśāt saptarūpavinivṛttām /
analyzed: tena nivṛtta prasavām artha vaśāt sapta rūpa vinivṛttām

original: prakṛtiṃ paśyati puruṣaḥ prekṣakavad avasthitaḥ svasthaḥ // ISk_65 //
analyzed: prakṛtim paśyati puruṣaḥ prekṣaka vat avasthitaḥ svasthaḥ

original: samyagjñānādhigamād dharmādīnām akāraṇaprāptau /
analyzed: samyak jñāna adhigamāt dharma ādīnām akāraṇa prāptau

original: tiṣṭhati saṃskāravaśāc cakrabhramavad dhṛtaśarīraḥ // ISk_67 //
analyzed: tiṣṭhati saṃskāra vaśāt cakra bhrama vat dhṛta śarīraḥ

original: prāpte śarīrabhede caritārthatvāt pradhānavinivṛttau /
analyzed: prāpte śarīrabhede caritārtha tvāt pradhāna vinivṛttau

original: aikāntikam ātyantikam ubhayaṃ kaivalyam āpnoti // ISk_68 //
analyzed: aikāntikam ātyantikam ubhayam kaivalyam āpnoti

original: puruṣārthajñānam idaṃ guhyaṃ paramarṣiṇā samākhyātam /
analyzed: puruṣa artha jñānam idam guhyam parama ṛṣiṇā samākhyātam

original: sthityutpattipralayāś cintyante yatra bhūtānām // ISk_69 //
analyzed: sthiti utpatti pralayāḥ cintyante yatra bhūtānām

original: etat pavitryam agryaṃ munir āsuraye 'nukampayā pradadau /
analyzed: etat pavitryam agryam muniḥ āsuraye nukampayā pradadau

original: āsurir api pañcaśikhāya tena ca bahulīkṛtaṃ tantram // ISk_70 //
analyzed: āsuriḥ api pañcaśikhāya tena ca bahulīkṛtam tantram

original: śiṣyaparamparayāgatam īśvarakṛṣṇena caitad āryābhiḥ /
analyzed: śiṣya paramparayā āgatam īśvarakṛṣṇena ca etat āryābhiḥ

original: saṅkṣiptam āryamatinā samyag vijñāya siddhāntam // ISk_71 //
analyzed: saṅkṣiptam ārya matinā samyak vijñāya siddhāntam

original: saptatyāṃ kila yo 'rthās te 'rthāḥ kṛtsnasya ṣaṣṭitantrasya /
analyzed: saptatyām kila yaḥ rthāḥ te rthāḥ kṛtsnasya ṣaṣṭitantrasya

original: ākhyāyikāvirahitāḥ paravādavivarjitāś ceti // ISk_72 //
analyzed: ākhyāyikā virahitāḥ paravāda vivarjitāḥ ca iti

original: tasmāt samāsadṛṣṭaṃ śāstram idaṃ nārthataś ca parihīnam /
analyzed: tasmāt samāsa dṛṣṭam śāstram idam na arthataḥ ca parihīnam

original: tantrasya ca bṛhanmūrter darpaṇasaṅkrāntam iva bimbam // ISk_73 //
analyzed: tantrasya ca bṛhat mūrteḥ darpaṇa saṅkrāntam iva bimbam
